name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs to clipboard, clipboard to tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy tabs URL (and title) to clipboard (formats : text, HTML, JSON or custom, order is possible). Reverse action.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy tabs URL (and title, depends on option) to clipboard (formats : text, HTML, JSON or custom, order is possible). Reverse action is possible : paste clipboard to tabs
